required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Pain Rate of Single Versus Two-visit Root Canal Treatment of Teeth With Necrotic Pulps
clinical_study.official_title: Acute Pain Rate of Single Versus Two-visit Root Canal Treatment of Teeth With Necrotic Pulp and Apical Periodontitis: A Multicenter Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Aim to compare acute pain rate after single-visit ortwo-visits treatment of teeth with necrotic pulp and apical periodontitis .90 teeth with a diagnosis of pulp necrosis and apical radiolucency at the apex.Working length was established with EAL and confirmed radiographically. Flex-R files were used to complete canal preparation. Level ofdiscomfort were recorded and cases with acute postoperative pain.

detailed_description.textblock: 90 teeth with a diagnosis of pulp necrosis and apical radiolucency at the apex.Working length was established with EAL and confirmed radiographically. M4system with Flex-R files were used to complete canal preparation. Level ofdiscomfort were recorded and cases with severe postoperative pain and/orswelling were classified as acute pain.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: 110 teeth with a diagnosis of pulp necrosis and apical radiolucency at the apex.Working length was established with EAL and confirmed radiographically. M4system with Flex-R files were used to complete canal preparation. Level ofdiscomfort were recorded and cases with severe postoperative pain
study_design_info.masking_description: compare Incidence of acute painafter single-visit ortwo-visits treatment of teeth with necrotic pulp

primary_outcome.measure: Pain intensity measure with general pain scale
primary_outcome.description: Each patient will recall a week to evaluate post operative pain

arm_group.description: Ibuprofen for Post operative pain. Take 400 mg takena week after. Incidence of flare ups after a single vsmultiple visits root canal treatments.
Acetaminophen 325 mg for Acute pain. Taken secondday after. Incidence of Post operative pain after rootcanal treatment in one vs two visits

intervention.description: All treatment sessions were approximately 45 minutes in length to allow for acceptable time for completionof treatment and retreatment in one or two visits. Allthe clinical procedures were performed by the author.Following local anesthesia with 2% lidocaine with1:100,000 epinephrine (Septodont Saint-Maur desFossés, France) and rubber dam isolation the toothwas disinfected with 5.25% NaOCl (Ultra bleach,Bentonville, AR, USA).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: a) Radiographic evidence of apical periodontitis (minimum size ≥2.0mm x 2.0 mm) and a diagnosis of pulpal necrosis confirmed by negativeresponse to hot and cold tests and b) Need for retreatment. Thermal pulptesting was performed by the author, and radiographic interpretation wasverified by one certified oral surgeon
-
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients without inclusion requirements or failure to obtain patient ́sauthorization. Patients, were excluded if they were younger than 18 yearsold, pregnant, had a positive history of antibiotic use within the past month,suffered from diabetes, or other systemic diseases. Teeth with periodontalpockets deeper than 4 mm also were excluded of the study

eligibility.gender_description: Patients from 18-65 years, both: male , fenale

responsible_party.investigator_title: Dr. Jorge Paredes Vieyra DDS, MsC, PhD

patient_data.ipd_description: Each participant will be evaluated a week after the treatment
